name: Goblins
description: Small, green-skinned humanoids known for their love of mischief and thievery.

name: Skeletons
description: Animated bones of the dead, often summoned by necromancers to do their bidding.

name: Zombies
description: Reanimated corpses with a hunger for living flesh.

name: Bandits
description: Outlaws who prey on travelers and merchants for wealth and resources.

name: Orcs
description: Large, brutish humanoids with a love for battle and a fierce loyalty to their leaders.

name: Werewolves
description: Humans that can transform into wolves during a full moon.

name: Vampires
description: Undead beings that survive by drinking the blood of the living.

name: Wraiths
description: Ghost-like creatures that can pass through solid objects and drain the life force of their victims.

name: Minotaurs
description: Humanoids with the head of a bull and great physical strength.

name: Giants
description: Huge humanoids with great strength and endurance.

name: Cyclops
description: Giant one-eyed humanoids known for their brute strength.

name: Harpies
description: Winged humanoids with the head and chest of a woman and the body of a bird of prey.

name: Necromancers
description: Wizards who specialize in raising the dead and manipulating the spirits of the deceased.

name: Dragons
description: Large, winged reptiles with a love for hoarding treasure and breathing fire.

name: Demons
description: Malevolent supernatural beings from the underworld, often summoned for their powerful magical abilities.
